answers.answer: Hypothyroidism can cause the symptoms you listed.  Have you been tested for diabetes?  I've read that many people with diabetes have the thick, dark skin under knees, elbows, etc.

I am going to check my "folder" lol! but my Glucose has always been in range...I don't have High Chol and it was never brought up...I haven't had a fasting since I was preg in 2006 though...12/2009 - 94 (70-100)6/2010 - 80 (70-100)12/2010 - 85 (65-139)11/2011 - 84 (65-139)12/2011 - 85 (No range given)Would this be a could indicator that I'm not...pretty consistent...?Thanks!

question: Can sinus problems, hoarseness, painful swallowing and bulging eyes be a symptom of Hypo/Hyper? What about the dry bumpy thickening skin under my knee? I have seen pics of that rash and mine is VERY mild compared to that but's it's there...I had my TSI checked and it was 28% (<140) so my doc said I don't have Graves.Thanks
title: Help with symptoms ...
